languages.text: "Очевидна {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}связь Вольного Торговца с представителями иного эльдарского подвида — друкари{/d}. Кто бы еще помог {mf|ему|ей} разгадать детально продуманный план темных эльдаров, как не другие друкари? {name} фон Валанциус каждый раз оказывал{mf|ся|ась} на месте очередного друкарского рейда, точно зная, куда и когда будет нанесен следующий удар".

traits.locale_text: "Очевидна связь Вольного Торговца с представителями иного эльдарского подвида — друкари. Кто бы еще помог {mf|ему|ей} разгадать детально продуманный план темных эльдар, как не другие друкари? {name} фон Валанциус каждый раз оказывал{mf|ся|ась} на месте очередного друкарского рейда, точно зная, куда и когда будет нанесен следующий удар".

languages.text: "The Rogue Trader's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}ties to the Drukhari{/d}, a different subspecies of Aeldari, are just as obvious. Who else could help {mf|him|her} divine the carefully prepared plans of the Drukhari if not other Drukhari? {name} von Valancius always ended up in the location of the next Drukhari raid, knowing for certain where they were going to strike."
languages.original_text: "Очевидна {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}связь Вольного Торговца с представителями иного эльдарского подвида — друкари{/d}. Кто бы еще помог {mf|ему|ей} разгадать детально продуманный план темных эльдаров, как не другие друкари? {name} фон Валанциус каждый раз оказывал{mf|ся|ась} на месте очередного друкарского рейда, точно зная, куда и когда будет нанесен следующий удар".

traits.locale_text: "The Rogue Trader's connection to the Drukhari, the members of a different subspecies of the Aeldari, is just as obvious. Who else could help {mf|him|her} divine the carefully prepared plans of the Dark Aeldari if not the other Drukhari? {name} von Valancius always ended up in the location of the Drukhari raid, knowing for certain where they are going to strike."

"The Rogue Trader's connection to the Drukhari, the members of a different subspecies of the Aeldari, is just as obvious. Who else could help {mf|him|her} divine the carefully prepared plans of the Dark Aeldari if not the other Drukhari? {name} von Valancius always ended up in the location of the Drukhari raid, knowing for certain where they are going to strike."

"The Rogue Trader's ties to the Drukhari, the members of a different subspecies of the Aeldari, are just as obvious. Who else could help {mf|him|her} divine the carefully prepared plans of the Dark Aeldari if not the other Drukhari? {name} von Valancius always ended up in the location of the Drukhari raid, knowing for certain where they were going to strike."

"The Rogue Trader's ties to the Drukhari, the members of a different subspecies of the Aeldari, are just as obvious. Who else could help {mf|him|her} divine the carefully prepared plans of the Dark Aeldari if not the other Drukhari? {name} von Valancius always ended up in the location of the Drukhari raid, knowing for certain where they were going to strike."

"The Rogue Trader's ties to the Drukhari, a different subspecies of Aeldari, are just as obvious. Who else could help {mf|him|her} divine the carefully prepared plans of the Dark Aeldari if not other Drukhari? {name} von Valancius always ended up in the location of the next Drukhari raid, knowing for certain where they were going to strike."

"The Rogue Trader's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}ties to the Drukhari{/d}, a different subspecies of Aeldari, are just as obvious. Who else could help {mf|him|her} divine the carefully prepared plans of the Drukhari if not other Drukhari? {name} von Valancius always ended up in the location of the next Drukhari raid, knowing for certain where they were going to strike."

"The Rogue Trader's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}ties to the Drukhari{/d}, a different subspecies of Aeldari, are just as obvious. Who else could help {mf|him|her} divine the carefully prepared plans of the Drukhari if not other Drukhari? {name} von Valancius always ended up in the location of the next Drukhari raid, knowing for certain where they were going to strike."

languages.text: « Les {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}liens {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} avec les Drukharis{/d}, une sous-espèce d'Aeldaris, sont tout aussi manifestes. Qui aurait pu l'aider à deviner les plans soigneusement élaborés par les Drukharis sinon les Drukharis eux-mêmes ? {name} von Valancius s'est toujours {mf|arrangé|arrangée} pour être {mf|présent|présente} lors des assauts drukharis, sachant avec certitude à quel endroit ils allaient frapper. »
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}ties to the Drukhari{/d}, a different subspecies of Aeldari, are just as obvious. Who else could help {mf|him|her} divine the carefully prepared plans of the Drukhari if not other Drukhari? {name} von Valancius always ended up in the location of the next Drukhari raid, knowing for certain where they were going to strike."

traits.locale_text: « Les liens {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} avec les Drukharis, des membres d'une sous-espèce des Aeldaris, sont tout aussi manifestes. Qui aurait pu l'aider à deviner les plans soigneusement élaborés par les sombres Aeldaris sinon les Drukharis eux-mêmes ? {name} von Valancius s'est toujours {mf|arrangé|arrangée} pour être {mf|présent|présente} lors des assauts drukharis, sachant avec certitude à quel endroit ils allaient frapper. »

languages.text: “行商浪人{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}与黑暗灵族狼狈为奸{/d}，黑暗灵族是艾达灵族的分支成员。{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯很清楚黑暗灵族的袭击计划，总是会提前出现在黑暗灵族袭击的地点守株待兔。如果不是得到了其他黑暗灵族的协助，还有谁能协助行商浪人提前得知黑暗灵族的袭击计划？”
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}ties to the Drukhari{/d}, a different subspecies of Aeldari, are just as obvious. Who else could help {mf|him|her} divine the carefully prepared plans of the Drukhari if not other Drukhari? {name} von Valancius always ended up in the location of the next Drukhari raid, knowing for certain where they were going to strike."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人与黑暗灵族同样狼狈为奸，黑暗灵族是艾达灵族的分支成员。{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯很清楚黑暗灵族的袭击计划，总是会提前出现在黑暗灵族袭击的地点守株待兔。如果不是得到了其他黑暗灵族的协助，还有谁能协助行商浪人提前得知黑暗灵族的袭击计划？”

languages.text: 「自由開拓者と、アエルダリの亜種である{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}デュカーリとのつながり{/d}は明白だ。もしデュカーリでないとしたら、他に誰が闇のアエルダリの周到に準備された計画を {mf|彼|彼女}に予期させることができただろうか？{name}フォン・ヴァランシウスは常にデュカーリの襲撃の場所に居合わせ、彼らが次に攻撃する場所を正確に知っていた」
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}ties to the Drukhari{/d}, a different subspecies of Aeldari, are just as obvious. Who else could help {mf|him|her} divine the carefully prepared plans of the Drukhari if not other Drukhari? {name} von Valancius always ended up in the location of the next Drukhari raid, knowing for certain where they were going to strike."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者と、アエルダリの亜種である{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}デュカーリとのつながり{/d}は明白だ。もしデュカーリでないとしたら、他に誰が闇のアエルダリの周到に準備された計画を {mf|彼|彼女}に予期させることができただろうか？{name}フォン・ヴァランシウスは常にデュカーリの襲撃の場所に居合わせ、彼らが次に攻撃する場所を正確に知っていた」

languages.text: "Die {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}Beziehungen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu den Drukhari{/d}, Angehörigen einer anderen Unterart der Aeldari, sind ebenso unübersehbar. Wer sonst könnte {mf|ihm|ihr} helfen, die akribisch vorbereiteten Pläne der Drukhari zu durchschauen, wenn nicht die anderen Drukhari? {name} von Valancius kam immer dort, wo die Drukhari ihre Raubzüge durchführten, und wusste ganz genau, wo sie zuschlagen würden."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}ties to the Drukhari{/d}, a different subspecies of Aeldari, are just as obvious. Who else could help {mf|him|her} divine the carefully prepared plans of the Drukhari if not other Drukhari? {name} von Valancius always ended up in the location of the next Drukhari raid, knowing for certain where they were going to strike."

traits.locale_text: "Die Beziehungen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu den Drukhari, Angehörige einer Unterart der Aeldari, sind ebenso unübersehbar. Wer sonst könnte {mf|ihm|ihr} helfen, die akribisch vorbereiteten Pläne der Dunklen Aeldari zu durchschauen, wenn nicht die anderen Drukhari? {name} von Valancius kam immer dort, wo die Drukhari ihre Raubzüge durchführten und wusste ganz genau, wo sie zuschlagen würden."

"Die Beziehungen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu den Drukhari, Angehörigen einer anderen Unterart der Aeldari, sind ebenso unübersehbar. Wer sonst könnte {mf|ihm|ihr} helfen, die akribisch vorbereiteten Pläne der Drukhari zu durchschauen, wenn nicht die anderen Drukhari? {name} von Valancius kam immer dort, wo die Drukhari ihre Raubzüge durchführten, und wusste ganz genau, wo sie zuschlagen würden."

languages.text: «Los {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}vínculos{/d} {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente con los Drukhari, una subespecie distinta de los Aeldari, son igualmente obvios. ¿Quién podría haberle ayudado a anticiparse a los planes cuidadosamente elaborados de los Drukhari sino otro Drukhari? {name} von Valancius siempre estaba allí donde tenía lugar la siguiente incursión Drukhari, pues sabía con total certeza dónde se iba a producir».
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}ties to the Drukhari{/d}, a different subspecies of Aeldari, are just as obvious. Who else could help {mf|him|her} divine the carefully prepared plans of the Drukhari if not other Drukhari? {name} von Valancius always ended up in the location of the next Drukhari raid, knowing for certain where they were going to strike."

traits.locale_text: «Los vínculos {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente con los Drukhari, miembros de una subespecie distinta de los Aeldari, son igualmente obvios. ¿Quién más podría haberle ayudado a anticiparse a los planes cuidadosamente elaborados de los Aeldari oscuros sino algún otro Drukhari? {name} von Valancius siempre estaba allí donde tenía lugar una incursión Drukhari, pues sabía con total certeza dónde se iba a producir».

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'in, Aeldarilerin alt türü olan {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}Drukharilerle olan bağları{/d} da bir o kadar açıktır. Drukharilerin dikkatle hazırlanmış planlarını tahmin etmesine Drukharilerden başkası yardımcı olmuş olabilir mi? {name} von Valancius, her daim Drukhari baskınlarının gerçekleşeceği yerlerde bulunmasını bilmiştir. Tam olarak nerelere saldıracaklarının kesin olarak farkında olmuştur."
languages.original_text: "The Rogue Trader's {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Trial_ServedDrukhari}ties to the Drukhari{/d}, a different subspecies of Aeldari, are just as obvious. Who else could help {mf|him|her} divine the carefully prepared plans of the Drukhari if not other Drukhari? {name} von Valancius always ended up in the location of the next Drukhari raid, knowing for certain where they were going to strike."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir'in, Aeldarilerin bir alt türü olan Drukharilerle olan bağları da bir o kadar açıktır. Onun Drukharilerin dikkatle hazırlanmış planlarını tahmin etmesine, diğer Drukharilerden başkası yardımcı olmuş olabilir mi? {name} von Valancius her daim Drukhari baskınlarının gerçekleşeceği yerlerde bulunmasını bildi. Tam olarak nerelere saldıracaklarının kesin olarak farkındaydı."
